sentences.sContent: He has recently been promoted to Assistant Manager.
sentences.sCn: 他最近晋升为经理助理。

sentences.sContent: Jerry lived in Cairo until quite recently .
sentences.sCn: 直至不久之前杰里一直住在开罗。

sentences.sContent: More recently, he’s appeared in a number of British films.
sentences.sCn: 最近，他出演了多部英国电影。

sentences.sContent: ...how about what one Hunter College professor reportedly did recently for her final exam: She encouraged the class not to stress or even study...
